answers.answer: Hello and Welcome to the Forum.You have a lot going on with your body (sx wise). I guess that a bit more info needs to be thrown out there.....Have you been to the doctors lately?  What type of doctors have you seen?Have you had any tests?  If so what kind?  Do these symptoms come and go?Are you able to work with all this going on?Giving just a bit more history may help to give you more information from us.~Tonya

These symptoms have existed for 4 years. I have been to the GP, was given ati boitics, they did not help. RPR, HIV/AIDS and urine test were done but were all negative. I then went to the Physician who recommended a more comprehensive approach of blood taste. He detected that i have an allergy because he also realised that i have a hole in my stomach. He said my body is reacting. He gave me anti biotics which i am busy taking, i feel better but not cured,i have been taking them for a month now. I should take them repeatatively for 6 months. My concern is that i my symptoms seem like STI's, syphyllis in particular.

Yes i am able to work if i drink herbal tea or some concotios if not i can't coz the pain is so unbereable. The symptoms go when i have drank these concoctions but reappear when i stop. Some appear mildly even when i am drinking these stuff. The things i drink do not heal but help me cope. The most observable is the weight i pick (swollen muscles) up evrytime this disease worsen.

if you are concerened about an STD have you expressed this to your doctor?Has he done a swab of the Genitals to check for an STD.  what did he say he was giving you the Antibioics for? What did he say he was treating?~Tonya

question: My symptoms are fast heart beat, pounding pulse in my head and can also be felt in the rest of my body like on my fingers, legs and son. A constant fever, dry mouth, red and itchy eyes, thick mucus sometimes, sore throat, difficulty in breathing sometimes, painful chest, coughing sometimes, peeling skin in my hands sometimes, itchy penis, pain in my stomach especially when i just ate, lower abdominal pains, burning urine sometimes, nauseas, dizziness, vomitting, and the whole body is swollen and everybody thinks i am fat as a result.I have tested for HIV/AIDS 3 times and results came negative. I also tested for Sugar diabetes and results were also negative. Please help.
title: Strange sickness
